alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 10:42PM EST until December 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations between one tenth and two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, and North Woods Maine * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation will change to snow Friday night and last into Saturday potentially making roads slippery with snow falling on ice.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Southeast Aroostook
